(Simplified: 榇)
Chinese Definition:
①棺材。
②古代多以梧桐木做棺，故爲梧桐的別稱。

櫬字的基本解释

櫬
chèn
见“榇”。

櫬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chèn］
［《廣韻》初覲切，去震，初。］
亦作“藽1”。“榇1”的繁体字。
(1)古时指内棺，后泛指棺材。
(2)梧桐的别名。
(3)樵薪。
[②]［qìn］
［《集韻》七刃切，去稕，清。］
“榇2”的繁体字。
木名。即木槿。

櫬字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫬； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页561第21
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?初覲切，音襯。【說文】棺也。【左傳·襄二年】穆姜爲櫬。【疏】櫬，親身棺也。以親近其身，故以櫬爲名。　又【爾雅】釋櫬者三：一，櫬，木槿。【註】今王蒸。一，櫬，梧。【註】今梧桐。一，櫬，采薪。【疏】樵薪一名櫬，一名采薪。　又七刃切，親去聲。木槿也。　又雌人切，音親。義同。　又【類篇】古玩切，音貫。汲器。　又【正韻】寸遴切，音襯。義同。

考證：〔【左傳·襄六年】穆姜爲櫬。〕　謹照原文六年改二年。

coffin
Basic explanation of words
coffin
chèn
See "榇".
coffin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chèn］
["Guangyun" at the beginning of the cut, to shake, at the beginning. ]
Also known as "藽1". Traditional characters for "榇1".
(1) In ancient times, it refers to the inner coffin, and later refers to the coffin in general.
(2) The alias of Wutong.
(3) Woodland salaries.
[②]［qìn］
["Jiyun" seven-blade cut, go to the 稕, clear. ]
"榇2" in traditional characters.
Wooden name. Namely hibiscus.
coffin

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榇; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 561-21
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? First cut, sound lining. [Said the text] The coffin is also. [Zuo Zhuan·The Second Year of Xiang] Mu Jiang is a young man. [Sparse] You, the coffin in person. In order to be close to him, so in the name of 榇.　[Erya] Three of the interpreters: one, 榇, hibiscus. [Note] King steaming today. One, Wu, Wu. [Note] Indus this year. One, stubbornness, picking salaries. 【Sparse】Qiao pays one salary, and the other collects salary.　Seven blades cut again, kisses. Hibiscus too.　The female cut again, the sound is kind. The same meaning.　[Category] Curiosity cut, sound continuum. Dipper.　 [Zheng Yun] Cun Lin cut, sound lined. The same meaning.
